headline: Software Engineer III at Meta (Facebook) | Backend Specialist | AI Enthusiast
summary: Results-driven Software Engineer III at Meta with 7+ years of experience designing scalable backend systems, leading cross-functional teams, and mentoring junior developers. Passionate about distributed systems, GraphQL APIs, and AI integration in enterprise software.

experiences.title: Software Engineer III
experiences.description: Leading the backend development for Facebook Marketplace using Hack and GraphQL. Worked on search optimization, real-time data syncing using Apache Kafka, and onboarding flows for new sellers. Collaborated with AI team to detect scam listings with 96% accuracy.

experiences.title: Software Engineer II
experiences.description: Developed and scaled the property listing backend microservices using Node.js and Kubernetes. Worked on payment gateway integration and led a team of 3 engineers in launching a successful host metrics dashboard.

experiences.title: Software Engineer I
experiences.description: Built REST APIs in Java Spring Boot for QuickBooks Online. Focused on customer authentication, session caching, and billing. Improved service response time by 30% after major refactor.

education.description: Graduated with honors. Member of ACM chapter. Final year project: Distributed Chat Application over P2P networks using WebRTC.

certifications.name: AWS Certified Solutions Architect â€“ Associate

projects.name: Scalable Chat App
projects.description: Built a horizontally scalable chat system using Node.js, Redis pub/sub, and WebSockets. Deployed on AWS ECS with auto-scaling and monitoring via Prometheus.

projects.name: Resume Parser AI
projects.description: A machine learning project that parses resumes and ranks candidates based on job requirements. Used spaCy, scikit-learn, and React.

volunteerExperience.description: Mentoring junior engineers and students on backend development and career advice.
Served as a judge evaluating over 50 AI and backend projects.

honorsAndAwards.title: Meta Engineering Excellence Award
honorsAndAwards.description: Awarded for designing a high-performance caching layer that reduced data retrieval latency by 40% across Facebook Marketplace.

honorsAndAwards.title: Airbnb Impact Award
honorsAndAwards.description: Recognized for leading the launch of a new analytics dashboard for hosts with high adoption and positive user feedback.
